input.sentences: i made a lot of food for our dessert party tonight .
i have butter on a plate .
i put the chocolate chips on the beans .
output.sentences: Tonight, I planned a party and a lot of people are expected to show up.
I needed to make the food, and the first thing I put on the plates was melted butter.
I had to make sweet and savory dishes, which the first dish being the beans.
The second thing I had to make was a cake that required chocolate chips, and when I was making the cake I accidentally spilled some in the beans!
However, the cake still came out okay.
